TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UrlMapping extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class UrlMapping Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 將對使用者顯示的 URL 對應至 Web 應用程式中網頁的 URL。

span.span: Maps a URL that is displayed to users to the URL of a page in your Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您將對應至存在於您的 Web 應用程式的 URL 的使用者顯示的 URL。The class allows you to map a URL that is displayed to users to a URL that exists in your Web application. 加入物件以程式設計方式相當於包括`add`中的項目`urlMappings`組態檔區段。Adding a object to a is the programmatic equivalent to including an `add` element in the `urlMappings` section of a configuration file. 每個物件包含兩個屬性的識別 URL。Each object contains two properties identifying a URL. 一個屬性會指定給使用者，顯示的 URL其他 Web 應用程式中指定的 URL。One property specifies the URL shown to the user; the other specifies a URL in your Web application. 尾端空格字元會被忽略，在這兩和屬性。Trailing white-space characters are ignored in both the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 屬性可將資訊寫入至 [區段] 屬性所定義的限制根據組態檔的相關區段其實。The property can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by the section property whose value is . 任何嘗試寫入組態檔不允許在階層中的層級，將會導致由剖析器產生的錯誤訊息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 不過，您可以使用這個類別來讀取階層架構中的任何層級的組態資訊。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. ## Examples 下列範例會使用之 web.config 檔案對應兩個 Url，並將對應加入額外的 URL。The following example uses the of the Web.config file to map two URLs, and adds a mapping for an additional URL. 當您修改並儲存 Web.config 檔案時，會重新啟動您的應用程式。When you modify and save the Web.config file, your application restarts. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2/cs/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2/vb/default.aspx#1)]

param.name: url
param.span: 要顯示給使用者的 URL。

span.span: The URL to be displayed to the user.

param.name: mappedUrl
param.span: 存在於 Web 應用程式中的 URL。

span.span: A URL that exists in your Web application.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式，會由 ASP.NET 適合主要是供內部使用。The constructor is intended primarily for internal use by ASP.NET. 您不需要從這個類別衍生，因為它可以用來修改 Web.config 檔案，您可能永遠不需要在程式碼中使用它。You do not need to derive from this class, and because it can be used to modify the Web.config file, you will probably never need to use it in code. ## Examples 下列範例會使用之 web.config 檔案對應兩個 Url，並將對應加入額外的 URL。The following example uses the of the Web.config file to map two URLs, and adds a mapping for an additional URL. 當您修改並儲存 Web.config 檔案時，會重新啟動您的應用程式。When you modify and save the Web.config file, your application restarts. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2/cs/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2/vb/default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MappedUrl As String
public: property System::String ^ MappedUrl { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Web 應用程式中的 URL。

span.span: A URL in your Web application.

value.span: Web 應用程式中的 URL，其已對應至 屬性指定的值。

span.span: The URL in your Web application that has been mapped to the value specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性就相當於程式設計上的`mappedUrl`屬性`add`中的項目`urlMappings`組態檔區段。The property is the programmatic equivalent of the `mappedUrl` attribute of the `add` element in the `urlMappings` section of a configuration file. > [!NOTE] > 當您使用 IIS 5.0 版，如果您使用屬性對應中支援的頁面類型 （例如.aspx 檔案） 不支援的分頁類型 （例如.asp 頁面），會發生錯誤。When using IIS 5.0, if you use the property to map from a supported page type (such as an .aspx file) to an unsupported page type (such as an .asp page), an error will occur. Iis 6.0 版支援此類型的對應。This type of mapping is supported in IIS version 6.0. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得屬性。The following code example shows how to obtain the property. 這個範例取自之較大範例的類別。This example is from a larger example for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2/cs/default.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2/vb/default.aspx#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection
Public ReadOnly Property Url As String
public: property System::String ^ Url { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得顯示給使用者的 URL。

span.span: Gets the URL that is displayed to the user.
The URL that is displayed to the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性就相當於程式設計上的`Url`屬性`add`中的項目`urlMappings`組態檔區段。The property is the programmatic equivalent of the `Url` attribute of the `add` element in the `urlMappings` section of a configuration file. ## Examples 如需範例，請參閱類別概觀。For an example, see the class overview.
